properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 1:22PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Illinois...

Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge affecting Porter County
Kankakee River near Kouts affecting Jasper and Porter Counties
Kankakee River near Wilmington affecting Grundy...Kankakee and Will
Counties
Sugar Creek at Milford affecting Iroquois County
Vermilion River at Pontiac affecting Livingston County

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge, or from US-421 south of La
Crosse downstream to IN-49 south of Kouts.
* from Monday evening until further notice.
* At  100 PM Saturday the stage was 6.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Monday evening and continue to
rise to near 11.5 feet by Thursday afternoon.
* Impact...At 12.0 feet...Secondary roads near the river flood.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.
